00013  * Purpose:

00015  * applications.
00016  *
00017  * Author:
00018  * Capt Kevin Owens
00019  * Air Force Institute of Technology
00020  *
00021  * Revisions:
00022  * 11 Nov 2004: created
00023  * 17 Nov 2004: expanded operator overloading support
00024  *                              added translation routines to Coord
00025  * 19 Nov 2004: added SonarReading, replaced RangeReading with MappedSonarReading
00026  * 22 Nov 2004: added operator<<(), width(), height(), add() to BoundBox
00027  * 23 Nov 2004: added operator=(), operator+=() to Pose
00028  * 29 Nov 2004: cppdoc
00029  * 13 Dec 2004: fixed bug in mappedTo(), where negative numbers were not properly rounded
00030  *                              fixed bug in rotatedBy(), where theta was incorrect with a zero x- or y-value
00031  * 16 Dec 2004: added scaling to Coord, Pose, MappedSonarReading
00032  * 22 Dec 2004: added operator-=() to Pose, replaced code preventing degree sum < 0 in Pose
00033  * 28 Dec 2004: added operator+=() and operator-=() to Coord
00034  */

00039 #define NUM_SONARS 16   // With great consternation, I resort to an ugly define for efficiency's sake;
00040                                                 // utilization within SonarReading resulted in a gain of ~30ms per 700 readings

00063 class Coord
00064 {
00065 public:
00066 
00068         int x;
00069 
00071         int y;
00072 
00074         Coord( int x_ = 0, int y_ = 0 ) : x( x_ ), y( y_ ) {}
00075 
00079         Coord& scale( const double factor );
00080 
00084         Coord scaled( const double factor ) { 
00085                 Coord c(*this); return c.scale( factor ); 
00086         }
00087 
00092         Coord operator-( const Coord& subtrahend ) const;
00093 
00098         Coord operator+( const Coord& addend ) const;
00099 
00103         Coord& operator=( const Coord& coord ) { 
00104                 this->x = coord.x; this->y = coord.y; return *this; 
00105         }
00106 
00110         Coord& operator+=( const Coord& addend ) { 
00111                 this->x += addend.x; this->y += addend.y; return *this; 
00112         }
00113 
00117         Coord& operator-=( const Coord& subtrahend ) { 
00118                 this->x -= subtrahend.x; this->y -= subtrahend.y; return *this; 
00119         }
00120 
00124         bool operator==( const Coord& coord ) const {
00125                 return x == coord.x && y == coord.y;
00126         }
00127 
00132         bool operator!=( const Coord& coord ) const {
00133                 return x != coord.x || y != coord.y;
00134         }
00135 
00140         Coord mappedTo( double th, double d ) const;
00141 
00146         void mapTo( double th, double d );
00147 
00152         Coord rotatedBy( double th, Coord pivot = Coord() ) const;
00153 
00158         void rotateBy( double th, Coord pivot = Coord() );
00159 
00161         double distanceTo( const Coord& coord ) const;
00162 
00164         double distanceFrom( const Coord& coord ) const { return distanceTo( coord ); }
00165 
00170         double angleTo( const Coord& coord ) const;
00171 
00176         double angleFrom( const Coord& coord ) const { return coord.angleTo( *this ); }
00177 
00179         friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Coord& coord );
00180 };

00187 struct BoundBox
00188 {
00190         Coord ul;
00191 
00193         Coord lr;
00194 
00196         BoundBox( int ulX = 0, int ulY = 0, int lrX = 0, int lrY = 0 )
00197                 : ul( ulX, ulY ), lr( lrX, lrY ) {}
00198 
00200         BoundBox( Coord ul_, Coord lr_ )
00201                 : ul( ul_ ), lr( lr_ ) {}
00202 
00204         int width() const { return abs( ul.x - lr.x ) + 1; }
00205 
00207         int height() const { return abs( ul.y - lr.y ) + 1; }
00208 
00210         bool contains( const Coord& point ) const;
00211 
00213         BoundBox& unionWith( const BoundBox& box );
00214 
00216         BoundBox& intersectWith( const BoundBox& box );
00217 
00219         BoundBox& expandBy( int n, int s, int e, int w );
00220 
00225         BoundBox operator-( const BoundBox& subtrahend ) const;
00226 
00231         BoundBox operator+( const BoundBox& addend ) const;
00232 
00234         friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const BoundBox& box );
00235 };

00242 struct Pose
00243 {
00245         Coord coord;
00246 
00248         double theta;
00249 
00251         Pose( Coord c = Coord(), double t = 0.0 ) : coord(c), theta(t) {}
00252 
00254         Pose( int x, int y, double t = 0.0 ) : coord(x, y), theta(t) {}
00255 
00259         Pose& scale( const double factor ) { coord.scale( factor ); return *this; }
00260 
00264         Pose scaled( const double factor ) const { Pose p(*this); return p.scale( factor ); }
00265 
00271         Pose operator-( const Pose& subtrahend ) const;
00272 
00278         Pose operator+( const Pose& addend ) const;
00279 
00283         Pose& operator=( const Pose& pose ) { coord = pose.coord; theta = pose.theta; return *this; }
00284 
00288         Pose& operator+=( const Pose& addend ) { *this = *this + addend; return *this; }
00289 
00293         Pose& operator-=( const Pose& addend ) { *this = *this - addend; return *this; }
00294 
00298         bool operator==( const Pose& pose ) const { 
00299                 return coord == pose.coord && theta == pose.theta; }
00300 
00305         bool operator!=( const Pose& pose ) const {     
00306                 return coord != pose.coord || theta != pose.theta; }
00307 
00309         friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const Pose& pose );
00310 };

00317 struct SonarReading
00318 {
00320         Pose robotPose;
00321 
00323         int sonarNumber;
00324 
00326         int distance;
00327 
00329         int all[NUM_SONARS];
00330 
00334         SonarReading()
00335                 : robotPose(), sonarNumber(0), distance(0) { initRanges( NULL ); }
00336 
00337 
00344         SonarReading( const Pose &p, const int *a = NULL, int s = 0 )
00345                 : robotPose(p), sonarNumber(s), distance(a==NULL?0:a[s]) { initRanges( a ); }
00346 
00347 
00352         SonarReading( ArRobot* robot );
00353 
00354 
00360         SonarReading( char *line );
00361 
00362 
00366         SonarReading( const SonarReading &r );
00367 
00368 
00373         void initRanges( const int *a );
00374 
00375 
00379         SonarReading& scale( const double factor ) { 
00380                 robotPose.scale( factor ); distance = static_cast<int>(distance / factor); return *this; }
00381 
00385         SonarReading scaled( const double factor ) { SonarReading r(*this); return r.scale( factor ); }
00386 
00387 
00391         SonarReading& operator=( const SonarReading &r );
00392 
00394         friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream &os, const SonarReading &pose );
00395 };

00402 struct MappedSonarReading
00403 {
00405         SonarReading reading;
00406 
00408         Pose sonarPose;
00409 
00411         Coord objectCoord;
00412 
00417         MappedSonarReading( SonarReading r = SonarReading(), Pose s = Pose(), Coord o = Coord() )
00418                 : reading(r), sonarPose(s), objectCoord(o) {}
00419 
00423         MappedSonarReading& scale( const double factor ) { 
00424                 reading.scale( factor ); sonarPose.scale( factor ); objectCoord.scale( factor ); return *this; }
00425 
00429         MappedSonarReading scaled( const double factor ) { 
00430                 MappedSonarReading r(*this); return r.scale( factor ); }
00431 
00433         friend std::ostream& operator<<( std::ostream& os, const MappedSonarReading& r );
00434 };
